text: Fire, Water, and Brass Pipes () is a 1968 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Aleksandr Rou.Кинотеатр «Иллюзион» приглашает киноманов посетить новогодние показыОгонь, вода и медные трубы It stars Natalya Sedykh, Aleksei Katyshev, and Georgy Millyar. ==Actors== * Natalya Sedykh — Alyonushka * Aleksei Katyshev — Vasya * Georgy Millyar — Koshchei, Baba Yaga * Vera Altayskaya — daughter of Baba Yaga == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1968 fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Rou
title: Fire, Water, and Brass Pipes
